overview: In Candida Royalle's groundbreaking feminist film, Eyes of Desire, Lisa discovers the thrill of voyeurism during her search for a more meaningful life. After being entranced by the mysterious man she spies on, this sequel to the best selling film follows their ensuing affair. Lisa's world has become consumed by the dark and sensuous Daniel Parish, as he takes her to heights of sexual pleasure that she never thought possible. But as she begins to approach her own erotic limits, Lisa is forced to make a painful choice when answering the question: is it possible to surrender to intense passion without losing yourself to another?
title: Eyes of Desire, part 2
